books.author: by James Comey
books.description: The former F.B.I. director recounts cases and personal events that shaped his outlook on justice, and analyzes the leadership styles of three presidents.
books.name: A HIGHER LOYALTY

books.author: by Michelle McNamara
books.description: The late true-crime journalist's search for the serial murderer and rapist known as "the Golden State Killer."
books.name: I'LL BE GONE IN THE DARK

books.author: by Ronan Farrow
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist chronicles the deterioration of American diplomacy.
books.name: WAR ON PEACE

books.author: by Jonah Goldberg
books.description: A senior editor at National Review assesses issues plaguing the left and the right.
books.name: SUICIDE OF THE WEST

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
books.name: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON

books.author: by Madeleine Albright with Bill Woodward
books.description: The former secretary of state examines the legacy of fascism in the 20th century and its potential revival.
books.name: FASCISM: A Warning

books.author: by Ainsley Earhardt with Mark Tabb
books.description: A memoir by one of the hosts of “Fox & Friends.”
books.name: THE LIGHT WITHIN ME

books.author: by Tara Westover
books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.
books.name: EDUCATED

books.author: by Amy Chozick
books.description: A New York Times journalist recounts her coverage of Hillary Clinton’s 2008 and 2016 presidential campaigns, and her own personal and professional milestones.
books.name: CHASING HILLARY

books.author: by Ali Wentworth
books.description: Through comic vignettes, the actress shares lessons she has learned.
books.name: GO ASK ALI

books.author: by John Doerr
books.description: How a goal-setting system helped large tech companies succeed.
books.name: MEASURE WHAT MATTERS

books.author: by David Reich
books.description: An exploration of how technological advances have changed our understanding of human prehistory through the extraction of DNA from ancient bones.
books.name: WHO WE ARE AND HOW WE GOT HERE

books.author: by Neil deGrasse Tyson
books.description: A straightforward, easy-to-understand introduction to the laws that govern the universe.
books.name: ASTROPHYSICS FOR PEOPLE IN A HURRY

books.author: by Clemantine Wamariya and Elizabeth Weil
books.description: A child and her sister flee the Rwandan genocide and suffer hardships together in Africa, only to go on different paths as refugees in the United States.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO SMILED BEADS

books.author: by Ian Bremmer
books.description: A look at the factions recently formed around the world in reaction to a perceived failure of globalism.
books.name: US VS. THEM
